axis2.name: #{Total Cycle Time}
axis2.text: KPI("CT Total", VARIABLE(<%= unit %>), VARIABLE(<%= process %>))

axis2.name: #{Undesired Activity}
axis2.text:
CASE WHEN PU_COUNT("<%= CASE_TABLE %>","_CEL_<%= process %>_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_<%= language %>","_CEL_<%= process %>_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_<%= language %>" IN (<%=Undesired%>)) > 0 
THEN 'With Undesired Act.' ELSE 'Without Undesired Act.' END

axis2.name: #{Repetition}
axis2.text:
CASE 
   WHEN COALESCE(PU_MAX("<%= CASE_TABLE %>", ACTIVATION_COUNT("_CEL_<%= process %>_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_<%= language %>"), 
            "_CEL_<%= process %>_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_<%= language %>" IN (<%= Repeated %>)),0)
            > 1 
   THEN 'With Repetition'
   ELSE 'Without Repetition'
END

axis2.name: #{AutomationRate}
axis2.text: KPI("Automation Rate PU", VARIABLE(<%= process %>), VARIABLE(<%= language %>), VARIABLE(<%= CASE_TABLE %>), VARIABLE(<%= AutoActivities %>), VARIABLE(<%= AutoTypes %>))

components.message:
General Information

#{This Sheet offers the opportunity to investigate user-specified wrong activity sequences. }

KPI Definition

#{Undesired Activity: }
#{Indicator whether a Undesired Activity has happened in the specific case. }

#{Repetition: }
#{Indicator whether a Repeated Activity (user defined) has happened in the specific case.}

#{Automation Rate: }
#{Share of automated activities. Calculated as # Activities (Automated) divided by # Activities (Automated) plus # Activities (Manual).}

variables.title: TIMEFRAME
variables.variableValue:
CASE
WHEN MONTH("EKKO"."AEDAT") IN (10,11,12) THEN YEAR("EKKO"."AEDAT") || ' - Q1'
WHEN MONTH("EKKO"."AEDAT") IN (1,2,3) THEN YEAR("EKKO"."AEDAT") || ' - Q2'
WHEN MONTH("EKKO"."AEDAT") IN (4,5,6) THEN YEAR("EKKO"."AEDAT" ) || ' - Q3'
WHEN MONTH("EKKO"."AEDAT") IN (7,8,9) THEN YEAR("EKKO"."AEDAT") || ' - Q4'
ELSE NULL
END

variables.title: TIMEFRAME
variables.variableValue:
CASE -- 2 digit Month
WHEN MONTH("EKKO"."AEDAT") >= 10
THEN YEAR("EKKO"."AEDAT") ||'-' || MONTH("EKKO"."AEDAT")
ELSE YEAR("EKKO"."AEDAT") ||'-0' || MONTH("EKKO"."AEDAT")
END

variables.title: TIMEFRAME
variables.variableValue:
CASE
WHEN CALENDAR_WEEK("EKKO"."AEDAT") >= 10
THEN YEAR("EKKO"."AEDAT")
--- ADD one Year if we are already in CW 1 at the end of December
+ CASE WHEN MONTH("EKKO"."AEDAT") = 12 AND CALENDAR_WEEK("EKKO"."AEDAT") = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
|| '-CW-' ||CALENDAR_WEEK("EKKO"."AEDAT")
ELSE YEAR("EKKO"."AEDAT") || '-CW-0' ||CALENDAR_WEEK("EKKO"."AEDAT")
END

variables.title: TIMEFRAME
variables.variableValue:
CASE -- 2 digit Month
WHEN MONTH( "EKKO"."AEDAT" ) >= 10
THEN CASE
WHEN DAY("EKKO"."AEDAT" ) >= 10
THEN YEAR("EKKO"."AEDAT" ) ||'-'|| MONTH("EKKO"."AEDAT" ) ||'-' || DAY("EKKO"."AEDAT" )
ELSE YEAR("EKKO"."AEDAT" ) ||'-'|| MONTH("EKKO"."AEDAT" ) ||'-0' || DAY("EKKO"."AEDAT" )
END
ELSE CASE
WHEN DAY("EKKO"."AEDAT" ) >= 10
THEN YEAR("EKKO"."AEDAT" ) ||'-0'|| MONTH("EKKO"."AEDAT" ) ||'-' || DAY("EKKO"."AEDAT" )
ELSE YEAR("EKKO"."AEDAT" ) ||'-0'|| MONTH("EKKO"."AEDAT" ) ||'-0' || DAY("EKKO"."AEDAT" )
END
END

variables.name: filter6
variables.value:
CASE
    WHEN ISNULL("LFA1"."VBUND") = 1 THEN 'External'
    ELSE 'Internal'
END

variables.name: filter7
variables.value:
CASE WHEN ISNULL("EKPO"."LOEKZ") = 1 THEN 'not deleted'
     WHEN "EKPO"."LOEKZ" = 'S' THEN 'locked'
     WHEN "EKPO"."LOEKZ" = 'L' THEN 'deleted'
     ELSE "EKPO"."LOEKZ"
END
